Body: In some Austronesian languages, which typically lack inflection, subjects appear structurally identical to their objects. What constructs do Verb-Subject-Object languages use to distinguish the two?
Title: How do isolating VSO languages differentiate the subject and object?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe:
I am a computational linguistics PhD candidate. But before that, long before that, I fell in love with languages.
